oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William E. Maury
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pencil sketch of William E. Maury. Maury was a member of Company C, 49th Tennessee Infantry, and was killed at the Battle of Franklin. His diary is in the Carter House Museum. Originally from Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, Maury had brothers who fought in the Federal army who also died. Sketch is published in "Images of Gettysburg."
